propagations.effect: High latency and error rate in the recommendation service
High latency and errors in the frontend service
High error rate in the checkout service

remediation.action: Review the readiness probe configurations for the kube-apiserver-itbench-control-plane and coredns pods.
Delete the kube-apiserver-itbench-control-plane and coredns pods to force Kubernetes to recreate them.
Continuously monitor the health and readiness status of the kube-apiserver-itbench-control-plane and coredns pods.
Check for any network connectivity issues between the pods and the etcd cluster.
Validate any changes made to the readiness probe configurations to ensure they align with best practices.
